19.description: Eric Clapton sells Richter painting for record $34.2 mn  |via @ABSCBNNewsLife LONDON, United Kingdom - A painting by Gerhard Richter owned by British guitarist Eric Clapton has sold for £21.3 million ($34.2 million, 26.4 million euros), a record for the work of a living artist, auction house Sotheby's said.

23.description: Eric Clapton sells Richter painting for record $34.2 mn: LONDON: A painting by Gerhard Richter owned by British ...

24.description: Eric Clapton sells Richter painting for record $34.2 mn: LONDON: A painting by Gerhard Richter owned by British ...  LONDON: A painting by Gerhard Richter owned by British guitarist Eric Clapton has sold for 21.3 million ($34.2 million, 26.4 million euros), a record for the work of a living artist, auction house Sotheby's said.An anonymous bidder bought the red, blue and yellow oil painting on canvas, "Abstraktes Bild (809-4)", in London on Friday for more than ten times the $3.4 million that Clapton paid for the painting plus two others in New York in 2001. The price beat pre-sale estimates and Richter's previous record of $21.9 million in May for "Abstract Picture (7938-3)". The German artist, 80, is described as the world's top-selling living artist. Richter was born in Dresden and grew up in communist east Germany. He now produces both abstract and figurative painting as well as photographs from his Cologne studio. His profile has been boosted by a retrospective, "Gerhard Richter: Panorama", which has been shown in London, Berlin and Paris this year. Clapton, 67, known for his work with Cream and Eric Clapton sells Richter painting for record $34.2 mn: LONDON: A painting by Gerhard Richter owned by British ...

161.description: What makes a Gerhard Richter painting worth £21 Million?  The one living artist who is dominating the art market at present is Gerhard   Richter, with a seemingly unquenchable appetite among buyers for his works.
